A family is held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legalized.

***********************************************************************************
This has been converted using "convertXtoDVD-5" so it is ready to burn to a blank dvd disc without having to do anything to the folder..just right click and burn as dvd..

The movie has been cropped and risized to 720x576 resolution to try and hide all of the subtitles that spoiled the film..

All to do to watch on pc is download folder and then "right click folder" aND SELECT "play with" or "open with" and select your best media player...vlc media player works with these folders... but since it is in like dvd  all to do is burn to disc as is..
